keyword: how many calories in coffee latte
title: How Many Calories in a Coffee Latte?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in coffee latte for a standard serving, plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for different milks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Coffee Latte?
assumptions: Standard 12 oz cafe latte with whole milk and double espresso shot; no added syrup, sugar, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, milk type, coffee shop, and additions like flavors or foam. Check menus or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz coffee latte with whole milk contains about 190 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or menu info.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk instead of whole

faqs.q: How many calories in a small coffee latte?
faqs.a: A 8 oz version with whole milk has about 120-140 kcal, depending on the shop.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a coffee latte?
faqs.a: Around 9 g from the milk in a standard 12 oz latte.
About 15 g carbs per standard latte, mostly from milk sugars; use non-dairy for lower.

faqs.q: How does milk type affect calories in coffee latte?
faqs.a: Whole milk: ~190 kcal; skim: ~100 kcal; almond: ~80-100 kcal for 12 oz.

faqs.q: Does espresso add calories to latte?
faqs.a: Negligibleâ€”espresso shots contribute fewer than 10 kcal total.
